venue.address_1: West Side Highway and West 15th Street
venue.name: Pier 57

item.description:
Event information

Date: Sat, Oct 13 Time: 12pm-6pm Price: $195 Location: Pier 57 - West Side Highway and West 15th Street

The Festival’s signature Grand Tasting presented by ShopRite with KitchenAid Culinary Demonstrations presented by MasterCard is headed back to historic Pier 57, jetting out into the Hudson River. An all-day, all-inclusive ticket offers access to culinary demonstrations from top Food Network and celebrity chefs, bites from NYC’s top restaurants and chefs, endless samplings of fine wine and spirits from the Southern Wine & Spirits of New York portfolio and interactive activities by top sponsors. The Culinary Demonstrations feature two continuously running stages with celebrity chefs showcasing their talent live; a rare opportunity to see your favorite personalities out of the kitchen and up close and personal.

KitchenAid Culinary Demonstration presented by MasterCard Schedule
